level.heading: Filings and reports as public documents.
level.text: All applications, filings, and reports required under this chapter shall be treated as public documents, except those which are trade secrets or privileged or confidential quality assurance, commercial, and financial information, other than any annual financial statement that may be required under § 31-3408.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-235, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3401.
